Narayana Guru Society of Sri Lanka ", has heretofore been established at Colombo for the purpose of effectually cerrying out and transacting all matters connected with the said Association according to the rules agreed to by its members ; - AND whereas the said Association has heretofore succese- fully carried out and transacted the several objects and matters for which it was established and has applied to be incorporated, and it will be for the public advantage to grant the application: BE it therefore enacted by the Parliament of the Demo- ¢ratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka as follows :-—
LL This Act may be elted as the Sree Narayana Guru Sheri title. Society of Sri Lanka Act, No. 48 of 1980.

2. From and after the date of commencement of this deegeppmtion Act much and so many persons as now are members of the Narsyane’ Gum Sree Narayena Guru Society of Sri Lanka (hereinafter Seutly of Sei referred to as “the Society"), or shall hereafter be admitted“ members af the Corporation hereby constituted, shall be a hody corporate (heveinatter referred to as “the Corpora- tion”) with perpetual succession, under the name and style of the “Sree Narayana Guru Society of Sti Lanka”, and by ‘that name shall and may sue and be sued in all courts, with full power and suthotity to have snd use a common seal and alter the same at its pleasure.
& The general objects for which the Corporation is Geant constituted are hereby declared to he— eee ee

iv) the establishment of a scholarship fund for the cproviston of financial aid to any person, irres- pective of caste, creed, colour or race, for hhigher studies and research on the teachings, ideals, and philosophy of Sree Nerayana Guru at any place of learning in Sri Lenka or abroad ;

«4. (1) The affairs of the Corporation shall, subject to the Board of rules in force for the time being of the Corporation, be anmied by a administered by a Board of Trustees assisted by a Working ote Committee consisting of such number of persons to be elected in accordance with the rules in foree for the time being of the Corporation.
(2) The first Board of Trustees of the Corporation shall be the members of the Board of Trustees of the Society holding ‘office at the time of the coming into operation of this Act
(3) The first Working Committee of the Corporation shall be the members of the Working Committee of the Society holding office at the time of the coming into operation of this Act.

5. (1) It shall be lawful for the Corporation, from time Bales of the to time, at a general meeting and by the votes of two-thirds 7pentiem- of the members present and voting to make rules for the admission, withdrawal or expulsion of members, for the conduct of the duties of the Board of Trustees, of the ‘Working Committee and of the various officers, agents and servants of the Corporation, for the procedare in the trans- action of business, and otherwise generally for the manage- ment of the affairs of the Corporation and the accomplish- ment of its objects.

(@) No rule of the Corporation for the time being in force, nor any rule which may hereafter be passed shall. be altered, added to, amended or rescinded except by the votes of two-thirds of the members present and voting at a general meeting of the Corporation.
(3) The rules of the Society in force at the time of the coming into operation of this Act shall be deemed to he the ules of the Corporation made under this section.
(4) All members of the Corporstion shail be subject to the rules in force for the time being of the Corporation.
